entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [JIT]: Codegen for manual devirtualization #60492
  • [mono] Generic Default Interface Method crash with Environment.StackTrace #60486
  • [mono] Tracking: Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.AvxVnni` #60485
    Future
  • [mono] Tracking: Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx2` #60484
    Future
  • [mono] Tracking: Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx` #60483
    Future
  • System.Drawing.Tests.PenTests.Ctor_Brush_Width<SolidBrush> test fail #60480
    Future
  • Make OptionsManager faster by falling back to IOptionsMonitor instead of IOptionsFactory #60473
  • [tvOS] System.Threading.Channels.Tests : System.InvalidOperationException : The result of the operation was already consumed and may not be used again #60472
    7.0.0
  • Bug about JsonNode.Deserialize with unicode #60470
  • `DateTime.Now` on Linux has wrong timezone #60469
    7.0.0
  • DispatchProxy.Create<IProxy, Base> uncastable to Base in custom load context #60468
  • allow custom memory allocator - mimalloc (linux,musl,glibc) #60467
  • Allow to use parameter for inherited class to DebuggerStepThrough attriubute #60477
  • Blazor wasm aot build time #60466
  • [tvOS] System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests: System.ExecutionEngineException : Attempting to JIT compile method while running in aot-only mode. #60462
    7.0.0
  • Way to reduce memory usage for long-running app on Linux. #60455
  • ValidateInterfaceImplTable enforces bogus ordering rules #60454
  • [Tizen ] X86 Linux CI for pull requests #60452

Closed

  • Disk files larger than 4GB may not be read properly #60430
    6.0.0
  • Returns the number of items skipped by the method Skip() of Utf8JsonReader #45202
    Future
  • [System.Text.Json] Handle IgnoreDataMember, even manually #35658
    Future
  • JsonSerializer additions to deserialize arrays from streams #31312
    Future
  • System.Text.Json ignores JsonPropertyName on BaseClass #31160
    Future
  • System.Text.Json serialize XElement error #43680
    Future
  • Migrating from Newtonsoft.Json to System.Text.Json reduces quality of validation errors #38271
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.JsonElement get parent element or document #40452
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: JsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreReadOnlyProperties being ignored #37599
    Future
  • DotNet 5.0 IdnMapping.GetAscii throws ArgumentException #60478
    Future
  • Improve consistency of JSONPath in JsonException #31955
    Future
  • [Wasm][AOT] The AOT compiler fails silently when running on Windows #57141
    7.0.0
  • Allows JsonStringEnumConverter.CreateConverter to specify a default enum value #30851
    Future
  • Add JsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreEmptyValues #38151
    Future
  • Fix exception for KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> when ReferenceHandler is on to match exception thrown by POCOs with parameterized ctor. #1882
    Future
  • Disable constant folding in JIT resulting in NaN, infinities etc #10905
    Future
  • Android x64: `Loader.classloader` runtime tests failing with `Error trying to get device: cmd: Can't find service: package` #59779
    7.0.0
  • IAsyncEnumberable should stop synchronous iterating after cancellation #58205
    7.0.0
  • Loosen strict KeyValuePair deserialization logic in reflection JSON serializer to match src-gen #59450
    7.0.0
  • Support ability to DeepClone a JsonNode in order to recursively create a copy of all children nodes #54019
    7.0.0
  • Unexpected CamelCase formatting in System.Text.Json #46445
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation Fault occurs on ARM and ARM64 with GTKSharp Library. #60051
  • Consider not throwing from Utf8JsonReader.TryGet* methods if the data type does not match #54557
    7.0.0
  • Text.Json Slowdown when using custom JsonConverter #45187
    7.0.0
  • Support static binding for serialization using System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer #58348
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow multiple calls to WriteRawValue of System.Text.Json.Utf8Writer #57412
    7.0.0
  • Allow custom converters to feed back to the POCO converter not to write the property name #50294
    7.0.0
  • Support ignoring property only on (de)serialization #52584
    7.0.0
  • Allow JsonIgnore on classes and structs #54269
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Retrieve Line / Column Numbers #53788
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Deserialize add support for change the collection type #60453
  • NullReferenceException in JsonSerializer.Deserialize #60448
  • Cannot run runtime tests with lttng 2.13 #60407
  • System.Net.Security.SslStream stream.TargetHostName is empty when SNI-name is not empty #60431

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update mac installers location string #60500
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Update mac installers location string #60499
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [hackathon] Implement CreateSpan<T> intrinsic. #60498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/60479 #60497
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/5.0] Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60496
    Servicing-consider, area-Host
  • fix rid processing on macOS #60494
    area-Host
  • [arm64] JIT: Don't emit OVERFLOW and DIVIDED-BY-ZERO for "X div CNS" #60493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvmonly] Optimize virtual calls in gsharedvt methods. #60491
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] string interpolation instead of concatenation #60490
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [hack] Mono byref of byref support #60489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Update IntelliSense package #60488
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update IntelliSense package #60487
    documentation, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • [Donot review ]Wasm tests #60482
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add documentation on how VN numbers memory #60476
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rerun mobile target jobs when it fails for 4 known scenarios #60475
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [QUIC] Fixed outerloop tests after #60181 #60465
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Optimize System.Diagnostics.TraceSource #60464
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Allow interp->jit transitions for generic methods. #60461
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix Int32 overflow bug in buffering logic #60460
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO
  • Use LastIndexOf in MSBuild for a single char #60450
  • Use getexepath in mono to deduplicate related code #60449
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] [reflection] Initialize default ALC gchandle in GetLoadContext #60399
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60446
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • Fix Int32 overflow bug in buffering logic #60459
    area-System.IO
  • disable flaky ReadAllBytes_NonSeekableFileStream_InWindows #60471
    area-System.IO, disabled-test, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Apply custom Message and Url to all [RequiresPreviewFeatures] attributes #60456
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0
  • Fix null being passed to g_path_get_dirname when probing in wasm #60445
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60265
    area-Build-mono
  • Eliminate pre-built assets during source-build #60370
    area-Infrastructure
  • Undo solution and config changes from DllImportGenerator #60481
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add non-intrinsic implementation for CreateSpan<T>. #60451
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Apply custom Message and Url to all [RequiresPreviewFeatures] attributes #60379
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/6.0] Move 2 Drawing APIs that are not implemented in netfx to net6.0 or later #60371
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Drawing
  • Improve value numbering for casts #59841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify set-reg-to-imm functions and optimize with LEA at runtime on x64 #60228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize indirection cell call sequences more generally #59602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add a missing else to the delegate init code. #60433
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Mono] Add check for field->type->byref #60420
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Optimize `StringBuilder` by embracing spans and `ISpanFormattable` more. #58907
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add tests exposing issue #60035 #60047
  • Exclude ref .cs files from .editorconfig formatting #60424
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Fix typedef for non-void interp entry callbacks #59990
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60364
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono/win] Build native runtime as Debug again #60263
    area-Build-mono
  • Use SDK-selected runtime in IL SDK #60400
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Sort oper allocation counts table #60223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Stabilize for RTM #60294
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Implement IAsyncEnumerable<T>.ToBlockingEnumerable #60363
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Remove FlakyAppHostTests category in installer tests #60354
    area-Host
  • [tests] In test wrapper scripts if -debug is gdb or lldb, add separator before corerun and args #60416
    test enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid a small int[] allocation in StringBuilder.Replace #60406
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • SrcGen fast-path serialization for nullable structs (#59719) #60366
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add Fuzzlyn to CI #60344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • issue 56835 make ordered dictionary kv collection implement i list #60060
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Loop Alignment support for Arm64 #60135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid int[] allocation in ResourceReader when reading a decimal #60408
    area-System.Resources
  • Add limited support for backtracking Regex single char loops to simplified code gen #60385
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Pick up a new build of Xunit #60044
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reflection Invoke share more coreclr/mono #60270
    area-System.Reflection

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove legacy tagger APIs once TypeScript moves to new API. #57180
  • Can we modify `LocalRewritingValidator` to enforce that `BoundUnconvertedObjectCreation` does not survive past local rewriting? #57179

Closed

  • VS 2022 - Add new class is always internal #57174
    17.0
  • Array Initializer into class property throws null reference exception #57153
  • "is new()" crashes csc.exe #57088
    17.1
  • Hovering over the dot before an invocation shows wrong overload #57031
    17.1
  • In Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections, pin S.C.Immutable to 5.0.0 to allow prebuilt reduction downstream #57129
  • Produce Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections NuGet package during source-build #57092
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unnecessary Symbol type checks #57181
    Area-Compilers
  • Add docs/compilers/CSharp/Params Span.md #57178
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Binder.CreateConversion - Report use-site diagnostics for the entire conversion hierarchy. #57175
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix DAG crash with removable numerical test following type test #57173
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements (Part 1) #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Ensure low-pri fixes go in the right async lightbulb bucket. #57171
    Area-IDE
  • Disable async lightbulbs #57169
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Add TypeScript External Access API for document highlighting, signature help #57168
    Area-IDE
  • Remove cancellation token from tagging context object. #57167
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Obtain OutputRefFilePath from project system #55244
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57144
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Explicitly report an exception on the host side when nav-to crashes #56682
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix 'T is new()' crash #57091
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57176
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix QuickInfo on dot of member access #57145
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P1
  • Merge 17.0-vs-deps to 17.0 #57156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid NFE telemetry for normal cancellation scenarios #57151
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove constraint check in interesting scenario for dynamic constraint checking feature #57131
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57166
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57182
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Draft #57161
    Area-IDE
  • Pass completion options explicitly throughout the implementation of completion providers #57058
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE
  • Document break for negative Length tests #57149
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Test, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Honor suppression on tuple element in switch #57118
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Ensure we don't throw when we filter an incomplete list to be empty #57160
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Record status for "newlines in interpolations" #57155
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Fix named mutex workaround for .NET Mono runtime #57003
    Area-Compilers
  • Build more projects during source-build #57165
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [DNM] Testing pool provider changes - Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Visual Studio 2022 Editor Color Scheme #57138
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
  • Completion options4 #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Adding some additional tests and asserts #57164
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Startup regression: json #37597
  • Framework is calling getter of readonly property of [BindProperty] object before calling OnPost() #37596
    Discussions
  • Hot reload loses CSS from referenced projects #37592
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor webassembly server using AOT #37591
  • Missing fractional seconds of date-time in ModelBinding #37590
  • Publish Blazor WebAssembly application and try to lazy load Razor Library assembly, met "Could not resolve type with token 01000014 from typeref balabala" error; #37586
  • Asp.Net Core 5.0 and Angular 12 sockjs-node error #37584
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #37579
  • [Question] Is there a way to intervene `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.ComponentBase.BuildRenderTree(RenderTreeBuilder)` method generation process in razor file? #37576

Closed

  • Question - Google Authentication Redirect URL #37595
  • Kestrel settings are not applied if configure KestrelServerOptions in appsettings.json file #37544
  • Update IdenitityModel dependencies (in 5.x) #37553
  • Newly-added/renamed static files give 404 when launching from VS #37508
    6.0.0
  • Blazor - Virtualize does not work if a table has fixed layout #29974
    6.0.0
  • UseHttpLogging not working .NET 6 RC 1 #37577
  • Can't start debugging Blazor WebAssembly with Hot Reload disabled in VS #37357
    6.0.0
  • InputBase sets wrong aria-invalid attribute value when validation failes #37389
    6.0.0
  • Blazor WASM with LazyLoad - Cannot publish web project in RC2 #37570
  • Perf improvement: json_nodejs #37545
  • Flaky test: AsciiBytesEqualAsciiStrings #31500
    Next sprint planning
  • `LoggingConnectionMiddlewareCanBeAddedBeforeAndAfterHttps()` is flaky #34561
    Next sprint planning
  • Investigate UseHttpsWithAsyncCallbackDoeNotFallBackToDefaultCert failures #25542
    Next sprint planning

PullRequests

Created

  • AzureB2C - Fix missing sign in button #37602
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • [AzureB2C] Fix missing sign in button #37601
    area-mvc
  • [Backport][Blazor] JS root component registration #37598
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Reenable test #37594
    area-runtime
  • Fix virtualization horizontal scrolling #37585
    area-blazor

Merged

  • HTTP/3: Fix failing client cert test #37578
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Backport #37532 (Pass IJSVoidResult instead of object to Invoke to indicate void result) #37566
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • [Static web assets] Fixes an issue where patterns at the root were not being considered (#37560) #37580
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix virtualization horizontal scrolling #37587
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Set the aria-invalid attribute to "true" instead of true (v2) #37589
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Only attempt to import blazor-hotreload.js is AspNetCore Browser tool… #37536
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Fix Typo in Documentation #37588
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Publish Windows x64/x86 checksums #37557
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Set the aria-invalid attribute to "true" instead of true (v2) #37523
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [Static web assets] Fixes an issue where patterns at the root were not being considered #37560
    area-blazor, feature-static-web-assets, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Enable helix retry for a small set of tests #37137
    area-infrastructure
  • Cherry-pick #37414 to [release/6.0] for #37340 #37417
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] JS root component registration #37180
    area-blazor
  • Support setting ApiParameterRouetInfo for endpoints #37470
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix #37340 by guarding the initial ping for SignalR #37414
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Specify the correct path for BlazorWASM project #37567
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug]Breakpoints not working on iPone Connected to MAC #2993
  • Map Controls.InputView.TextTransform #2990
  • Map Controls.Picker.TextTransform #2989
  • Map Controls.TimePicker.TextTransform #2988
  • Map Controls.DatePicker.TextTransform #2987
  • Map Controls.Button.TextTransform #2986
  • Fix Razor Scoped CSS so it doesn't cause errors in iOS/MacCatalyst bundle targets #2981
  • [Bug] Buttons's Border Color not rendering #2980
  • [Bug] MAUI-Template: net6.0-ios is missing RuntimeIdentifier ios-arm64 #2979
  • Update CodeOwners #2978
  • Update or remove repro.md #2977
  • [Enhancement] TV Apps #2974
  • [Bug] Effects does not work #2973
  • [Bug] <MauiImage> won't accept PNG file for Android AppIcon #2972
  • [Bug] Run on iOS Remote device fails #2971
  • [Bug] IOS Simulators Not Populated on Pair #2970
  • [Bug] Label TextTransform doesn't work #2969
  • [Bug] XAML Hot Reload throwing error on LinearGradientBrush code #2968
  • [Bug] Unable to set image as ContentPage BackgroundImageSource #2966
  • [Bug] Removing content from layout hot reloads blank #2965
  • [Bug] UI doesn't update when content is added to XAML #2964
  • [Bug] UI not updating after property removed and hot reloaded #2963
  • [Bug] XAML Hot Reload change to BindableLayout ItemsSource blanks content #2962
  • [Bug] Exception thrown: 'System.TypeLoadException' in Microsoft.Maui.Controls.dll #2961

Closed

  • [Help] ApplicationVerificationFailed #2984
  • [Bug] maui-check fails #2991
  • [Bug] Centered Horizontal Stacklayout inside a Vertical StackLayout doesn't measure children correctly #2853
  • [Bug] Image is not rendering inside the frame layout #2824
  • [Bug] Label placed inside Frame does not render correctly, appears squished. #1508
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • [Bug] Frame.Content not rendered until window resized #2588
  • [Bug] Frame content does not update from Device.StartTimer callback method for Windows app #2832
  • [Bug] Frame no longer renders CornerRadius #2844
  • (6.0.100-rc.1.21458.32) Build Action MauiCss is excluded from CSS Isolation #2556
  • [Bug] Updating Page title anywhere after constructor doesn't reflect, observed while using NavigationPage #1658
  • [Bug] [Android] InvalidOperationException "NavigationStack cannot be empty" when attempting back navigation on empty NavigationPage #2521
  • [Bug] [Android] OnAppearing not called when using Page navigation. #2434
  • Uncomment -windows TFM to Templates #2716
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] Visual Studio 2022 RC - 17.0.0 Cant create MAUI project #2975
  • [Bug] Dynamically added children not reflect in Maui Preview 9 #2946

PullRequests

Created

  • Apply TextTransform for Controls Label #2985
    area/controls 🎮
  • Set WarningsAsErrors=true on template builds #2982
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • Make shimmed Frame work on Android/Windows #2677
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.101-preview.9
  • WIP: Update Blazor Desktop template to latest .NET 6 content #2938
  • [Android] ToolbarHandler and fixes for various page nesting scenarios #2781
  • Bring back windows #2976
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2960
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Win2D Preview 2 #2967
  • Update the Windows App SDK and Win2D #2668
    area/desktop 🖥️

Updated

  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮
  • [WinUI] Implement SearchBar IsTextPredictionEnabled property #2911
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • Customize Android and Windows ScrollView behavior to include Padding inside of scroll area #2959
    area/layout 🔲
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SqliteConnection.Dispose does not release .db file on Windows (6.0 rc1 ->) #26369
  • Enum mapped to char keeps producing database modifications on each migration #26366
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 RC2 Entity Framework -> Nullable object must have a value. #26364
    6.0.0

Closed

  • Test Subquery_with_Distinct_Skip_FirstOrDefault_without_OrderBy is non-deterministic #26353
    MQ
  • Query: Add more tests for Queryable.Reverse #19356
    7.0.0
  • Multiple entities owning the same object hierarchy breaks migrations #26333
  • database not created with x86 platform #26367
  • Regression: GroupJoin (left join) fails when using InMemory provider and entity has an Owned type #26354
  • Stringlength/Maxlength ignored on record when creating migration #26365
  • string case sensitivity not working #26328
  • You can avoid scaffolding the connection string by using the Name= syntax to read it from configuration #26273
  • Scaffolding command amends PK column name (intcol to intcol1) #25995
  • EF Core Closed Connection #26339

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Configure the correct end as principal for self-ref collection with [ForeignKey] #26372
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Fix to #26353 - Test Subquery_with_Distinct_Skip_FirstOrDefault_without_OrderBy is non-deterministic #26363
    auto-merge
  • Fix to #19356 - Query: Add more tests for Queryable.Reverse #26362

Updated

  • Cache Eventargs in SQLiteConnection #26291
    community-contribution
  • Case sensitive parameters 18861 #26287

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • After .NET 6.0.100-rtm.21512.6(x64) installed on Apple M1, the installed location is incorrect on install wizard. #12388
    6.0.1xx

Updated

  • MacOs installer resources are unlocalized #12301

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove install location from Windows conclusion #12401
  • Add patches for building more roslyn projects #12397

Merged

  • Update mac conclusion UI string #12399
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Remove msbuild prebuilts using patches #12369
  • [ArPow] Resolve dotnet/linker Mono.Cecil prebuilt with patch #12372
  • [ArPow] Restore arcade patch that was inadvertently removed #12391
  • [ArPow] Update aspnetcore to use built versions of analyzers #12375
  • Resolve Microsoft.Extensions.CommandLineUtils prebuilt #12356
  • Don't update implicit versions this month #12379
  • Update TestConfig.xml #12296

Updated

  • Add format repo to source-build tarball #12351
  • Add downloading of runtime assets from dotnetbuilds #12374
  • [release/6.0.1xx] [ArPow] Add smoke test for OmniSharp #12251
